page.title: 13Landsmans
page.content: {Landsmans}started in 1947 when lots of people did not have houses and they lived in{caravans.}Mr.Spreckley used his land rover to move caravans from place to place.Another man joined him, then another and they had 3 land rovers working.He began selling caravans from his home. Then he moved to a larger site in{Buckden Road}and he began to employ people to repair caravans.Later he had a factory in Huntingdon where they made caravans (but this is closed now).He began making mobile dormitories,offices & toilets and taking them wherever they were needed.Now they maintain these and service them and take them all over the country to building sites and shows.Landsmans was one of the first firms to introduce{co-ownership.
